This is to inform you that Earl Vfynn has indicated his
interest in being considered for the job of Executive Director
and will be available, if given favorable consideration by the
organization, January 1, 195>3, but not before that date.

X regret that I have no lead on the two or three other
names which I was to explore but am still, working on the list.
The question this committee should consider at this point
is whether to attempt a meeting prior to the convention to
interview one or two possible candidates or wait until that
meeting to get together. If members of the committee feel that
we have made enough progress on the names at the top of our
list, that is if we have enough information on Bro, Morris,
Wynn, Peterson, and others, to narrow the list down to not
more than three people and have these three people meet with
us, then I feel we should have a meeting by the middle of
October so that we can come up with a specific recommendation
at the November convention. I should like to have an expression
from members of this committee as soon as possible •
